check.name: ResourceIdentifierPresent
check.description: Checks to see if at least one Resource Identifier concept exists.
check.code:
def call(): global output global status
output = "The concept ResourceIdentifier is present."
if(ResourceIdentifier is not None and len(ResourceIdentifier) > 0): status = "SUCCESS" return True
status = "FAILURE" output = "ResourceIdentifier concept is not present"
return False
